column4: I am running Hardy and would like have the 27 kernel. i am wondering whether it'd be possible to add the intrepid repos to my sources list and somehow convince apt-get to use those repos for the necessary kernel packages. I presume this is possible, is there some docs I could read on this ? someone would please guide me?
yeah, the kernel package probably has way to many dependencies to overcome, but you can always compile your own from source(non-package that way)
